rows.label: qst400305_msg0001
rows.name:
That must be the one
Chepaan-san mentioned.

rows.label: qst400305_msg0002
rows.name: Just as I heard, it looks tough.

rows.label: qst400305_msg0003
rows.name:
Tora wants to fight too,
but all I'd be good for is
a decoy or bait, mo...

rows.label: qst400305_msg0101
rows.name:
We don't need you to do that!
Leave it to us! Right, Homura?

rows.label: qst400305_msg0103
rows.name:
But don't rely only on my
power. Please make use of
everyone's strength.

rows.label: qst400305_msg0104
rows.name:
That way, even if Rex is the
only Driver, our fighting
strength will be doubled.
